q1.question: Are my API keys safe?
q1.answer: Yes, all API keys are securely stored using Fernet encryption. You can disconnect anytime, and all encrypted data will be completely deleted.

q2.question: Is this against platform terms of service?
q2.answer: No. We use a user-owned account model. You create your own accounts on each AI platform and connect them here for management. We never create proxy accounts.

q3.question: Is it free?
q3.answer: Yes, the MVP version is completely free. We may add premium features in the future, but core functionality will always be free.

q4.question: How do I connect Telegram?
q4.answer: 1. Find our bot on Telegram and run /start. 2. Copy the connection code provided. 3. Enter it in Settings page.
